variable.name: FS157

OCCASIONALLY OR MODERATE AMOUNT OF TIME (3-4 DAYS)
MOST OR ALL OF THE TIME (5-7 DAYS)

variable.name: FS325

variable.name: FS327
variable.description: BEER: IN THE PAST YEAR, HAVE YOU HAD ANY BEER (12 OZ.)?

variable.description: BEER: AVERAGE NUMBER OF DAYS/WEEK YOU DRINK BEER (12 OZ.)

variable.value: NONE OR DRANK MORE THAN ONE WHITE WINE PER WEEK

variable.description: RED WINE: AVERAGE NUMBER OF DAYS/WEEK YOU DRINK RED WINE (4-5 OZ.)

variable.description: RED WINE: AVERAGE NUMBER OF DRINKS PER WEEK (4-5 OZ.)
